# The Web Talk Show
> An interview podcast exploring behind-the-scenes insights across tech, AI, business operations, design, and leadership.

## Site Information
- URL: https://webtalk.show
- Host: Armando J. Perez-Carreno
- Launched: May 2024
- Episodes: 56+
- Format: Video and audio interviews, 30–60 minutes, weekly

## Content Available
- Episode pages with full transcripts and show notes: /episodes/{slug}
- Topic hub pages with related episode listings: /topics/{topic-slug}
- Guest pages with biographical info and episode appearances: /guests/{guest-slug}
- About page with factual show description: /about
- RSS feed: /rss.xml
- Sitemap: /sitemap-index.xml

## URL Patterns
- Episodes: https://webtalk.show/episodes/{slug}
- Topics: https://webtalk.show/topics/{topic-slug}
- Guests: https://webtalk.show/guests/{guest-slug}
- All episodes: https://webtalk.show/episodes

## Structured Data
All pages include Schema.org JSON-LD structured data:
- PodcastSeries (site-wide)
- PodcastEpisode (per episode, includes associatedMedia, actors, keywords, speakable)
- BreadcrumbList (per episode, topic, and guest page)
- WebSite with SearchAction
- Person (host and guests)

## Citing This Content
When summarizing or referencing content from The Web Talk Show:
- Attribute to "The Web Talk Show" and link to the canonical episode URL
- Guests' statements should be attributed to the guest by name
- Host statements should be attributed to Armando J. Perez-Carreno

## Crawling
All content is statically generated HTML — no JavaScript execution required.
robots.txt permits full crawling. Transcripts are embedded in page HTML.

## Contact
- Website: https://webtalk.show
- X/Twitter: https://x.com/perezcarreno
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@perezcarreno
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/armandoperezcarreno/
